adapter_name.title: Name
adapter_name.description: Provide a unique name for this adapter instance. Example: milvus-vdb-1

uri.title: URI
uri.description: Provide the URI of the Milvus server. Example: `https://<instance-id>.api.gcp-us-west1.zillizcloud.com`

token.title: Token
token.description: Provide the token (API Key) of the Milvus server. Leave empty for local server
